transcript:
Agent: Hello, my name is John and I'm calling from XYZ Corporation. How are you today?
Customer: I'm doing well, thank you. What's this call about?
Agent: We're a leading provider of cybersecurity solutions, and I'm calling to discuss our flagship product, SecureShield.
Customer: Oh, I've heard of it. What makes it so special?
Agent: SecureShield offers real-time threat detection and advanced encryption, protecting your business from potential cyber threats.
Customer: That sounds interesting. We've been having some issues with malware lately.
Agent: I see. Well, SecureShield can help you mitigate those risks and ensure your data is safe.
Customer: How does it work?
Agent: It's a cloud-based solution that's easy to install and manage. Our team will provide you with dedicated support.
Customer: What kind of support are we talking about?
Agent: You'll have access to our 24/7 hotline, as well as regular software updates and security patches.
Customer: Okay, that sounds good. What's the pricing like?
Agent: We offer a tiered pricing model, starting at $500 per month for small businesses.
Customer: That's a bit steep for us. Do you have any discounts available?
Agent: Yes, we're currently offering a 10% discount for new customers.
Customer: That helps. I'd like to discuss this further with my team. Can you send me some more information?
Agent: Absolutely. I'll send you a follow-up email with a brochure and a custom quote.
Customer: Great, thank you. I look forward to reviewing it.
Agent: You're welcome. Is there a good time for me to follow up with you next week?
Customer: Yeah, Wednesday or Thursday would be fine.
Agent: Sounds good. I'll talk to you then. Have a great day!
